derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a noun denoting an introductory text): from late Latin introductorius, from Latin introducere (see introduce)

entry.tran: 引言的;导论的;介绍性的
entry.def: An introductory remark, talk, or part of a book gives a small amount of general information about a particular subject, often before a more detailed explanation.

example.ex: ...an introductory course in religion and theology.

entry.def: An introductory offer or price on a new product is something such as a free gift or a low price that is meant to attract new customers.

example.ex: ...just out on the shelves at an introductory price of £2.99.
example.tran: 刚刚以2.99英镑的新品促销价上架
